name: Breathless Structure
description: Jean-Luc Godard's nouvelle vague narrative emphasizing spontaneity and improvisation
distribution_philosophy: Based on Godard's improvisational structure with emphasis on character moments and spontaneous developments

spontaneous_beginning.name: Spontaneous Beginning
spontaneous_beginning.description: The story begins in the middle of action without extensive setup

character_exploration.name: Character Exploration
character_exploration.description: Extended sequences exploring character psychology and relationships

improvised_developments.name: Improvised Developments
improvised_developments.description: Plot developments emerge organically from character actions

existential_crisis.name: Existential Crisis
existential_crisis.description: Characters face philosophical or existential dilemmas

ambiguous_resolution.name: Ambiguous Resolution
ambiguous_resolution.description: The ending is open to interpretation, avoiding clear closure
